function.name: search_user_info_by_email
function.description: Gather base user information from the TargetProcess database using a user's email address.

email.description: The email value used to search for the user in the TargetProcess database.

function.name: search_user_info_by_name
function.description: Gather base user information from the TargetProcess database using a person's first, or last, or both first and last names.

first_name.description: The first name of the person to search for in the TargetProcess database.

last_name.description: The last name of the person to search for in the TargetProcess database.
